title: Platform Engineering Is Not Just about the Tools
author: Atulpriya Sharma
description: Platform engineering isn’t solely about the tools and components but also about alignment within the organization and a special focus on understanding user needs.
cntitle: 平台工程不仅仅是关于工具
cndescription: 平台工程不仅仅是关于工具和组件，还包括组织内部的协调以及特别关注理解用户需求。
